name: Alex The Kidd0
description:
Alex is a boy who does not fear his enemies.

Guide Alex to save his brother defeating all 4 guardians of this world.

Featuring:

  • Platformer Game with 50 Hand Crafted Levels
  • Jump On Enemies to Kill System
  • Total of 4 Bosses
  • Check Point System - So player starts where he/she left off even the device is turned off.
  • Fun Puzzles using Physics

Have great fun with this classic game!!!

PS: This is 32 bits version only.
